name: Special Topics in Social Inequality
description: Sociological analyses of stratification processes and the production of social inequality with a focus on economy and politics.  Topics covered may include work and labour markets, the state and political processes.  Attention is given to grassroots mobilization, social movements, and contestatory politics.
prerequisites: [SOCB05H3 or [SOCB40H3) and (SOCB41H3)] or STAB23H3]] and [0.5 credit from the following: SOCB30H3, SOCB42H3, SOCB43H3, SOCB47H3]
